About me

Welcome to my online home. Here I post my projects, blogs and everything else. I’m first year undergrad student Living in New Delhi. I’m an open-source and Linux enthusiast. I love to learn something new. I enjoy music, video games, food and Peace. Feel free to give me a shout at mail[at]shubhamjain[dot]in. Attached is my résumé in pdf format. :)
